title: Kyle Shanahan accidentally smashed a TV trying to upstage Andrew Luck

sources.name: Yahoo Sports NFL
sources.title: Kyle Shanahan accidentally smashed a TV trying to upstage Andrew Luck
sources.description: The Super Bowl is about more than the two teams playing the game, with people around the league flocking to San Francisco to be a part of the festivities. This included 49ers head coach Kyle Shanahan, who got a little too carried away as part of a friendly ball toss. Both Roger Goodell and Andrew [â€¦]
